main event: On October 2, 1954, in Atlanta, Georgia, a large bright object followed by a small bright light was observed. The small object caught up to the large one, and two jets flying in formation came overhead and directed towards the large object.
interesting points: The large bright object was followed by a small bright light, and the small object caught up to the large one.
Two jets flying in formation came overhead and directed towards the large object.
The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes and involved ground visual observation.
The object exhibited erratic motion and changed brightness according to different observers.
The object was observed to suddenly become very bright as it turned slowly to the northwest, then quickly disappear in a flash of light.
sighted object: large bright object followed by a small bright light
photographs: no, the report does not include photographs
